ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of CHARLOTTE A. SALOMON, Q.C., of Victoria, British Columbia, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on May 1, 2021.
